reasoning.problem: Review and adjust the Stagnation Veto parameters. Given the expansion of data streams beyond financial data, the current criteria (INJECTION_DAI exceeding 20% of NAV) may be insufficient to accurately gauge fear-based stagnation. Request the Department of Strategy & Research to develop new, more comprehensive risk assessment metrics that incorporate code evolution, governance participation, and overall system health.
